attributes.background: People would like to have a 3 day weekend as they feel that it'd helps with their mental health

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It is up to individuals and their employers what days of the week they work.

If you want the school week to be reduced to four days, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715
